item.description:
Are you working full time on your J.O.B.? Are you working part time on your Fortune?
Look at income streams like legs on a dog...if you only have one, you just kinda lay there, if you have 2, you can drag yourself around a little, if you have 3, you can get up and start running, if you have 4 nothing will stop you. Are you a 1 legged dog, dragging yourself around, running or unstoppable?
Jim Rohn - Ideas can be life-changing. Sometimes all you need to open the door is just one more good idea.
Tuesday, 2/12/2013, 7pm
Come learn about an idea/concept/vehicle/stream of income to help you reach your fortune...you can decide if you want to be just like Jim Rohn, who said,
"I'm working full time on my J.O.B. and part time on my Fortune, would you like to hear my story."
Industry Legend Steve Schulz will share this concept with you and will show you how he went from being an under paid school teacher to making millions.
When: Tue, 2/12/2013, 7pm
Where: FDIY Training Center, 1 Industrial Dr., Windham, NH

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Are you working at your J.O.B. or on your Fortune?
